name: @browsermt/bergamot-translator
description: Cross platform C++ library focusing on optimized machine translation on the consumer-grade device.

scripts.build: docker run --rm -v $(realpath ../../):/src -v $(pwd):/dst emscripten/emsdk:$npm_package_config_emscripten_version sh -c "mkdir /build && cd /build && emcmake cmake -DCOMPILE_WASM=on -DWORMHOLE=off /src && emmake make -j2 && cp bergamot-translator-worker.{js,wasm} /dst"
